p: While inspired by the planetary boundaries concept, Horton and other public health professionals recognise the important role of health at the centre of the sustainability challenges. They see human and environmental health as two sides of one coin. This has culminated in the emergence of the concept of “planetary health”, which is defined as “the health of human civilisation and the state of the natural systems on which it depends” (Whitmee et al. 2015; see also Myers 2017).
